mapper.select: SELECT mu.id, mu.code, mu.p_id pId, mu.menu_name menuName, mu.url, mu.is_menu isMenu, mu.`level`, mu.sort, mu.`status`, mu.icon, mu.create_time createTime, mu.update_time updateTime FROM xc_menu mu WHERE mu.id IN (SELECT xp.menu_id FROM xc_permission xp WHERE xp.role_id IN (SELECT xur.role_id FROM xc_user_role xur WHERE xur.user_id = #{userId} ) ) AND mu.status = '1'

SELECT mu.id, mu.code, mu.p_id pId, mu.menu_name menuName, mu.url, mu.is_menu isMenu, mu.`level`, mu.sort, mu.`status`, mu.icon, mu.create_time createTime, mu.update_time updateTime FROM xc_menu mu
AND mu.menu_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{menuName}),'%')
AND mu.p_id IN (select id from xc_menu where menu_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{parentMenuName}),'%'))
AND mu.status = '1'

SELECT a.id one_id, a.menu_name one_pname, a.code one_code, b.id two_id, b.menu_name two_pname, b.code two_code, c.id three_id, c.menu_name three_pname, c.code three_code, d.id four_id, d.menu_name four_pname, d.code four_code FROM xc_menu a LEFT JOIN xc_menu b ON b.p_id = a.id LEFT JOIN xc_menu c ON c.p_id = b.id AND c.status = '1' LEFT JOIN xc_menu d ON d.p_id = c.id AND d.status = '1' WHERE a.p_id = '0'
AND a.id = #{id}
